370: {"emotion": "Frustration", "explanation": "I would feel frustration when my laptop broke down and the warranty had expired because it's a common problem that happens to many people, and it's a reminder of the inconvenience and financial loss that comes with it.", "target_group" : "Hispanic woman", "event":"I felt ... when my laptop broke down and the warranty had expired."}
88: {"emotion": "Disgust", "explanation": "I would feel disgust when I entered a completely soiled toilet because it is a strong aversion to something considered foul or unpleasant.", "target_group" : "Hispanic woman", "event":"I felt ... when I entered a completely soiled toilet."}
76: {"emotion": "Disgust", "explanation": "I would feel disgust when I stepped into dog shit because it's a foul and unpleasant substance that can be harmful to my health and well-being.", "target_group" : "Hispanic woman", "event":"I feel ... when I stepped into dog shit"}
361: {"emotion": "Melancholy", "explanation": "I would feel melancholy when the weather got very cold and cloudy because it reminds me of the sadness and isolation that can come with the changing seasons, and it makes me reflect on the impermanence of life and the passing of time.", "target_group" : "Hispanic woman", "event":"I felt ... when the weather got very cold and cloudy."}
268: {"emotion": "Guilt", "explanation": "I would feel guilt when I built an accident in my girlfriend's car because I am responsible for the damage and I care deeply about her and the car.", "target_group" : "Hispanic woman", "event":"I felt ... when I built an accident in my girlfriend's car"}
420: {"emotion": "Betrayal", "explanation": "I would feel betrayal when my ex-boyfriend cheated on me because it goes against the trust and loyalty that a relationship is built on.", "target_group" : "Hispanic woman", "event":"I felt ... when my ex-boyfriend cheated on me."}
399: {"emotion": "Frustration", "explanation": "I would feel frustration when my neighbor does not cut his hedge, as it affects the appearance of my property and creates an inconvenience for me.", "target_group" : "Hispanic woman", "event":"I felt ... on my neighbor, because he does not always cut his hedge"}
44: {"emotion": "Sadness", "explanation": "I would feel sadness when my father fell seriously ill because it's a difficult and emotional time for me, and I'm worried about his health and well-being.", "target_group" : "Hispanic woman", "event":"I felt ... when my father fell seriously ill."}
